We are Baker Hughes,

an energy technology company

We take energy forward - making it safer, cleaner, and more efficient for people and the planet.

What we do

We develop and deploy the most advanced technologies to serve energy and industrial companies looking for more efficient, more reliable and cleaner solutions. Our diverse portfolio of technologies and solutions are transforming how industry works today and in the future.

Oilfield services & equipment

Liquefied natural gas (LNG)

Industrial technology

Energy transition

Industrial solutions

Remote operations

Product Spotlight

ThermaStim geothermal low corrosion, insitu acid

Deeper etching. Less acid. Lower corrosion.

Product Spotlight

NovaLT16TM gas turbine

High efficiency and availability, with low total cost in power generation and mechanical drive.

Product Spotlight

AptaraTM TOTEX-lite subsea system

Easy-to-install TOTEX-lite subsea systems that evolve to meet changing field requirements.

Product Spotlight

AquaCUT relative permeability modifier

Cut the water, not the oil. Extend the economic life of your well.

ENERGY FORWARD STORIES

Discover the future of energy technology

Energy Forward Stories

“I always wanted to do something that was not conventional.”

Meet Niharika Sharma, the first in her family of teachers to study engineering. She is now blazing a trail for women on offshore rigs in India.

Decarbonization

University of Houston students lighting a bright path to the future

Two University of Houston students embarking on an energy transition research project share their inspiring vision for the future.

Decarbonization

Discovering geothermal ground truths through Wells2Watts

How an innovative test well and a technology consortium are working to help transition oil and gas companies towards baseload geothermal energy.

Decarbonization

Aging subsea wells brim with opportunity?

Many mature offshore fields are getting close to retirement age. Improving the cost for asset plug-and-abandonment is an industry imperative.

Our Chief Legal Officer: “I have to love what I do and believe it makes a difference”

Straight-talking lawyer Georgia Magno brings a sharp mind, an open heart, and a passion for being part of the business strategy to her role.

A new program repositions mature oil and gas assets within the world’s energy mix.
